messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] Shakespeare song
messages.msgSnippet: Kathryn, I loved this.  I am this morning way cool because I got a music clip in my boring e-mail.  I played it at top volume for all to enjoy.  I just
messages.messageBody:
Kathryn,
I loved this. I am this morning way cool because I got a music clip in my
"boring" e-mail. I played it at top volume for all to enjoy. I just wanted to
share the way they share with me <VBG>.
Actually I really liked it. Will share it with my CD recording guru, my
17yods, who has stared a business recording CD demos for his garage band friends
in our basement.
Thanks for the jolly,
Beth
mother, to 5 teens and a 10 yo wanna-be, who often feels hopelessly
outnumbered and way uncool


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
